other_tests.findings: Patient remained depression-free after initiation of sleep deprivation therapy.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Before treatment, patient experienced 15 episodes of severe depression over two years. After sleep deprivation therapy, there were no depressive relapses for 8 months.

other_tests.findings: Initial WAIS scores showed verbal comprehension IQ of 120, performance IQ of 90, and memory scale score of 101.
other_tests.changes_over_time: After 10 days of drug withdrawal, WAIS scores improved to verbal comprehension of 128, performance IQ of 121, and memory scale of 143.

other_tests.findings: Initial WAIS scores showed verbal score of 98 and performance score of 96.
other_tests.changes_over_time: At discharge, 20 days post-drug withdrawal, WAIS verbal score improved to 110.
